full_text:
Fwd: Re: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
From [redacted]
To [redacted]
Date 2019/07/29 07:25
Subject: Fwd: Re: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Per the below, Epstein's attorney is bringing his CPAP today. I advised him to ask for you. Thank you.
[redacted] @gmail.com> 7/28/2019 11:44 PM >>>
If you let Mr. [redacted] know that I'll be there around 12:30, I'd appreciate it. Thank you!
From: [redacted] @bop.gov
Sent: July 26, 2019 2:03 PM
To: [redacted] @gmail.com
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
You can bring it to the lobby and as for Mr. [redacted] our Assistant Health Services Administrator.
>>> [redacted] @gmail.com> 7/26/2019 12:02 PM >>>
Yes, I will have the machine delivered on Monday. Please give me a name and a place for the delivery. Thanks again for your help.
From: [redacted] @bop.gov
Sent: July 26, 2019 11:46 AM
To: [redacted] @gmail.com
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
Good morning Mr [redacted]

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the delivery of a CPAP machine to Jeffrey Epstein. The names and email addresses of the individuals involved have been redacted.
